about_the_game: The Nightmare Jar presents the Official OST for ClayTown Horror, created by the fantastic Simon Jones. Each track was originally composed in several layers, so that the music could be adaptive rather then static. This way layers of the music could be faded in or out depending on the situation. For your enjoyment we have compressed those layers into singular tracks. We hope you listen and enjoy our lovely nightmare music.
detailed_description: The Nightmare Jar presents the Official OST for ClayTown Horror, created by the fantastic Simon Jones. Each track was originally composed in several layers, so that the music could be adaptive rather then static. This way layers of the music could be faded in or out depending on the situation. For your enjoyment we have compressed those layers into singular tracks. We hope you listen and enjoy our lovely nightmare music.
name: ClayTown Horror OST
short_description: Chill beats to fight nightmares to.
